title: I Am a Child of This House - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Abandoned Children   Adapted to Manhwa   Age Progression   Aristocracy   Arrogant Characters   Awkward Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Child Protagonist   Childcare   Coming of Age   Complex Family Relationships   Couple Growth   Cruel Characters   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Devoted Love Interests   Different Social Status   European Ambience   Famous Parents   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   First Love   Forced Living Arrangements   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Honest Protagonist   Inheritance   Magic   Maids   Master-Servant Relationship   Naive Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Popular Love Interests   Royalty   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Wealthy Characters
author: Siya   시야
description:
11-year-old Estelle, never in her wild guess imagined she’d be sold off on a whim by her own mother.

The buyer?

The one and only duke in the empire, Ein Castiello… and… he’s Estelle’s father?!

Her father was a duke feared across kingdoms and nations for his blood-red eyes and immense power due to his magical lineage.

Ein Castiello was the cold-blooded master of House of Castiello.

His sworn enemies and dashing knights could become Estelle’s worries, but does being his rare daughter mean that she a child of this house?>
